did.abstract: Letter from G.W. Purefoy of Asheville, N.C. to Mary Constant regarding his eagerness and plans for a visit from her; photocopy of a newspaper clipping regarding G.W. Purefoy's 90th birthday; telegram from Robert R. Reynolds to Mary Cooper Schoepf regarding a speech on immigration legislation; a Master Mason's Certificate (1872) for S.C. Cooper; and 2 photographs of a vacation to Chimney Rock (ca. 1895).
